blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms

Class BasicShaderProgramBase<M extends Material>

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.ShaderProgramBase
      • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.MaterialShaderProgram<M>
        • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.BasicShaderProgramBase<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleShaderProgram

    public abstract class BasicShaderProgramBase<M extends Material>
extends MaterialShaderProgram<M>
    This base class extends MaterialShaderProgram with some most used implementations of abstract methods such that the projection matrix, view matrix, transform matrix will be loaded into their uniform variables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicShaderProgramBase(VertexShader vertexShader, FragmentShader fragmentShader)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of basic shader program base.
